SELECT count(*), w.name AS 'warehouse', e.name AS 'employee', u.name AS 'unit' FROM product p LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON p.warehouse_cod = w.cod LEFT JOIN employee e ON p.employee_cod = e.cod LEFT JOIN unit u ON p.unit_Cod = u.name WHERE p.deleteyn = 'N'
AND p.cod = #{cod}
AND w.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{warehouse}, '%')
AND e.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{employee}, '%')
AND account LIKE CONCAT('%', #{account}, '%')
